definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: Fleur darted through the window into the morning room.
sentences.chinese: 芙蕾三腳兩步從窗戶進入了那間起居室。
